恶堕档案——七神凛败北问罪
这是云神Renbocloud恶堕档案世界的某个篇章，云神马上要更咲妃篇了，蹲蹲
随着基沃托斯越来越多的学生逃学，以及从黑市向各个学院行政区蔓延的灰色产业。联邦学生会察觉到了事态正在走向失控。发现老师精神状态不佳的凛提出帮助老师分担这次事件的压力。
但殊不知，在黑暗势力壮大的同时，他也需要强大的保护伞作为从暗处走向明处的力量庇护。凛的出现正中了他的下怀：他需要更多的权力。
联邦学生会代理会长下场是会让这场堕落的狂宴悬崖勒马，亦或是，给它添把火，让它走向更为混乱的极端呢？

[ENG]

Fallen Files —— Seven Gods Rin Defeated and Convicted
This is a certain chapter in the world of the fallen archives of the cloud god Renbocloud. The cloud god is about to update the Sakihime chapter
As more and more students in Kivotos skip school, and the gray industry spreads from the black market to the various college boroughs. The Federal Student Union sensed that things were spiraling out of control. Rin, who discovered that the teacher was in a bad mental state, offered to help the teacher share the stress of the incident.
But little did he know that as the dark forces grew, he also needed a powerful umbrella as a refuge for the power to move from the dark to the bright. Rin's appearance plays right into his hands: he needs more power.
What happens to the acting president of the Federal Student Union that this depraved banquet will be brought to a halt, or that it will be fueled and taken to even more chaotic extremes?
n: [Misc] [White Flavor No. 3] Fallen Files —— Seven Gods Rin Defeated and Convicted [AI-Generated]
